t: And*p in that day you will say: “O*pn Lord,*s I will praise You; Though*ld You were angry with me, Your*ld anger is turned away, and You comfort me.
Behold,*ld God is*i my salvation, I*ld will trust and not be afraid; ‘For*ld Yah,*s the Lord,*s is*i my strength and song; He*ld also has become my salvation.’”
Therefore*ln with joy you will draw water From*ld the wells of salvation.
And*p in that day you will say: “Praise*pn the Lord,*s call upon His name; Declare*ld His deeds among the peoples, Make*ld mention that His name is exalted.
Sing*ld to the Lord,*s For*ld He has done excellent things; This*ld is*i known in all the earth.
Cry*ld out and shout, O inhabitant of Zion, For*ld great is*i the Holy One of Israel in your midst!”
